thread.section_title: The Chesterfield Mayfair - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Willy Wonka Afternoon Tea
thread.title_full: Willy Wonka Afternoon Tea - Review of The Chesterfield Mayfair, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Georgina M
title: Willy Wonka Afternoon Tea
text:
What can I say? Well from the first moment we had the door opened for us, to when we were taken to where our table was for afternoon tea, it was perfect!
The staff were so friendly and couldn't do enough to make us happy!
The afternoon tea was SO delicious, I really haven't tasted anything so lovely for ages. I had such a wonderful time and cannot wait to return!
Thank you to all the lovely staff at the Chesterfield Mayfair! xxxx
